title: The Smurfs (NO Cinavia)
description:
Intended for Blu-Ray players effected by Cinavia.
The subs however are for players like VLC & PotPlayer.


When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world and into ours -- in fact, smack dab in the middle of Central Park. Just three apples high and stuck in the Big Apple, the Smurfs must find a way to get back to their village before Gargamel tracks them down. Rated PG
